meanings.sent1: The goldurns traffic made me late for work.
meanings.sent2: She let out a goldurns sigh when her computer froze.
meanings.sent3: I can't find my keys again, goldurns it!
meanings.sent4: The never-ending rain was a goldurns nuisance.
meanings.sent5: The goldurns mosquito buzzing in my ear kept me up all night.

meanings.definition: Used as a substitute for a swear word.
meanings.sent2: Goldurns, that was a close call!
meanings.sent3: Goldurns, I forgot my umbrella on a rainy day.
meanings.sent4: The cake fell on the floor, goldurns it!
meanings.sent5: Goldurns, I can't believe I missed the bus again.

meanings.definition: A slang term for something that is annoying or frustrating.
meanings.sent1: Dealing with that goldurns computer glitch is so annoying.
meanings.sent2: She called the broken printer a goldurns piece of junk.
meanings.sent3: The long line at the store was a goldurns inconvenience.
meanings.sent4: His constant excuses were a goldurns bother to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The noisy neighbors were a goldurns disturbance to the whole street.
